scenario_text.value:
Ugh, it’s no use. We’re never going to find
any clues about how to get out of here.

Try not to get too wound up. Let’s just stay
calm and keep searching.

This can’t be happening! I have to find a way
out! I have to get everyone out right now!

Shuuji seems like he’s not doing so well.
I feel bad for poor Lopmon, too.

I wonder if it’s because nothing’s been going
Shuuji’s way.

(He seemed like he was finally starting to
settle down earlier.)

(But I guess he’s still pretty shaken up
after all.)

I need to find a way out! I have to! I have
to get everyone to safety!
(I wish he’d rely on us more.)
